p:
A phylogenetic tree of ASVs was constructed for each dataset, as described by Callahan et al.
82 . Briefly, multiple sequence alignment of ASVs was performed using the AlignSeqs function from the DECIPHER R package v 2.8.1
83 . Aligned ASVs were then used to build a phylogenetic tree using the phangorn R package v 2.5.3
84 .
